verses.verse: וּבְיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> Now in the twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <S%H702><s%> and fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of this month הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> of this נֶאֶסְפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> were assembled בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּצ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> with fasting וּבְשַׂקִּ֔ים <S%H8242><s%> and with sackclothes וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> and earth עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <S%H914><s%> separated זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> And the seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֑ר <S%H5236><s%> alien וַיַּעַמְד֗וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood וַיִּתְוַדּוּ֙ <S%H3034><s%> and confessed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חַטֹּ֣אתֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> their sins וַעֲוֹנ֖וֹת <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquities אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> And they stood up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in עָמְדָ֔ם <S%H5977><s%> in their place וַֽיִּקְרְא֗וּ <S%H7121><s%> and read בְּסֵ֨פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book תּוֹרַ֧ת <S%H8451><s%> of the law יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their God רְבִעִ֣ית <S%H7243><s%> [one] fourth part הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day וּרְבִעִית֙ <S%H7243><s%> and [another] fourth part מִתְוַדִּ֣ים <S%H3034><s%> they confessed וּמִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔ים <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God פ

וַיָּ֜קָם <S%H6965><s%> Then stood up עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מַֽעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> upon the stairs הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua וּבָנִ֜י <S%H1137><s%> and Bani קַדְמִיאֵ֧ל <S%H6934><s%> Kadmiel שְׁבַנְיָ֛ה <S%H7645><s%> Shebaniah בֻּנִּ֥י <S%H1138><s%> Bunni שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah בָּנִ֣י <S%H1137><s%> Bani כְנָ֑נִי <S%H3662><s%> [and] Chenani וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> and cried בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said הַלְוִיִּ֡ם <S%H3881><s%> Then the Levites יֵשׁ֣וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua וְ֠קַדְמִיאֵל <S%H6934><s%> and Kadmiel בָּנִ֨י <S%H1137><s%> Bani חֲשַׁבְנְיָ֜ה <S%H2813><s%> Hashabniah שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֤ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah הֽוֹדִיָּה֙ <S%H1941><s%> Hodijah שְׁבַנְיָ֣ה <S%H7645><s%> Shebaniah פְתַֽחְיָ֔ה <S%H6611><s%> [and] Pethahiah ק֗וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Stand up בָּרֲכוּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> [and] bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הָעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and ever וִיבָֽרְכוּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name כְּבוֹדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3519><s%> be thy glorious וּמְרוֹמַ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> which is exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> above all blessing וּתְהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> and praise

אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> you ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Thou [even] thou [art] LORD לְבַדֶּךָ֒ <S%H905><s%> alone [אַתְּ כ] (אַתָּ֣ה <S%H853><s%> ק) עָשִׂ֡יתָ <S%H6213><s%> alone thou hast made אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַיִם֩ <S%H8064><s%> heaven שְׁמֵ֨י <S%H8064><s%> the heaven הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heavens וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָ֗ם <S%H6635><s%> with all their host הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> that עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַיַּמִּים֙ <S%H3220><s%> and all [things] that [are] therein the seas וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after בָּהֶ֔ם וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> You מְחַיֶּ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> and all that [is] therein and thou preservest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> to all וּצְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> them all and the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven לְךָ֥ מִשְׁתַּחֲוִֽים׃ <S%H7812><s%> worshippeth

אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> you הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> You יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Thou [art] the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> the God אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who בָּחַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H977><s%> who didst choose בְּאַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> Abram וְהוֹצֵאת֖וֹ <S%H3318><s%> and broughtest him forth מֵא֣וּר <S%H218><s%> out of Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldees וְשַׂ֥מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> and gavest שְּׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> him the name אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> of Abraham

וּמָצָ֣אתָ <S%H4672><s%> And foundest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבוֹ֮ <S%H3824><s%> his heart נֶאֱמָ֣ן <S%H539><s%> faithful לְפָנֶיךָ֒ <S%H6440><s%> before וְכָר֨וֹת <S%H3772><s%> thee and madest עִמּ֜וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with הַבְּרִ֗ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לָתֵ֡ת <S%H5414><s%> with him to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> the land הַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֜י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittites הָאֱמֹרִ֧י <S%H567><s%> the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֛י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַיְבוּסִ֥י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֖י <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashites לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לְזַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> [it I say] to his seed וַתָּ֙קֶם֙ <S%H6965><s%> and hast performed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H1697><s%> thy words כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> for thou [art] righteous אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> You

וַתֵּ֛רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And didst see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֳנִ֥י <S%H6040><s%> the affliction אֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַעֲקָתָ֥ם <S%H2201><s%> their cry שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> and heardest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> by the Red

וַ֠תִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> And shewedst אֹתֹ֨ת <S%H226><s%> signs וּמֹֽפְתִ֜ים <S%H4159><s%> and wonders בְּפַרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> and on all his servants וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and on all the people אַרְצ֔וֹ <S%H776><s%> of his land כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> for thou knewest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵזִ֖ידוּ <S%H2102><s%> that they dealt proudly עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> toward וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> against them So didst thou get לְךָ֥ שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> thee a name כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְהַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> the sea בָּקַ֣עְתָּ <S%H1234><s%> And thou didst divide לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> them so that they went through בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> the midst הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> on the dry land וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֨דְפֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H7291><s%> and their persecutors הִשְׁלַ֧כְתָּ <S%H7993><s%> thou threwest בִמְצוֹלֹ֛ת <S%H4688><s%> into the deeps כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> Like אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> as a stone בְּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עַזִּֽים׃ <S%H5794><s%> into the mighty

וּבְעַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar עָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> by a cloudy הִנְחִיתָ֖ם <S%H5148><s%> Moreover thou leddest יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> them in the day וּבְעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> by a pillar אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> of fire לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and in the night לְהָאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> to give them light לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> go בָֽהּ׃

וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> on הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> also upon mount סִינַי֙ <S%H5514><s%> Sinai יָרַ֔דְתָּ <S%H3381><s%> Thou camest down וְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and spakest עִמָּהֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> from מִשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> with them from heaven וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and gavest לָהֶ֜ם מִשְׁפָּטִ֤ים <S%H4941><s%> judgments יְשָׁרִים֙ <S%H3477><s%> them right וְתוֹר֣וֹת <S%H8451><s%> laws אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> and true חֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> statutes וּמִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> and commandments טוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבַּ֥ת <S%H7676><s%> sabbath קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H6944><s%> unto them thy holy הוֹדַ֣עַתָ <S%H3045><s%> And madest known לָהֶ֑ם וּמִצְו֤וֹת <S%H4687><s%> them precepts וְחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> statutes וְתוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> and laws צִוִּ֣יתָ <S%H6680><s%> and commandedst לָהֶ֔ם בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant

וְ֠לֶחֶם <S%H3899><s%> them bread מִשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven נָתַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> And gavest לָהֶם֙ לִרְעָבָ֔ם <S%H7458><s%> for their hunger וּמַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> water מִסֶּ֛לַע <S%H5553><s%> for them out of the rock הוֹצֵ֥אתָ <S%H3318><s%> and broughtest forth לָהֶ֖ם לִצְמָאָ֑ם <S%H6772><s%> for their thirst וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and promisedst לָהֶ֗ם לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> them that they should go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֥אתָ <S%H5375><s%> accept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> able לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶֽם׃

וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they וַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> But they and our fathers הֵזִ֑ידוּ <S%H2102><s%> dealt proudly וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7185><s%> and hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> their necks וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> not to thy commandments

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <S%H3985><s%> And refused לִשְׁמֹ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> to obey וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not זָכְר֤וּ <S%H2142><s%> neither were mindful נִפְלְאֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6381><s%> of thy wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou didst עִמָּהֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> among וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7185><s%> among them but hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> their necks וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> appointed רֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> a captain לָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> to return לְעַבְדֻתָ֖ם <S%H5659><s%> to their bondage בְּמִרְיָ֑ם <S%H4805><s%> and in their rebellion וְאַתָּה֩ <S%H859><s%> you אֱל֨וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> but thou [art] a God סְלִיח֜וֹת <S%H5547><s%> ready to pardon חַנּ֧וּן <S%H2587><s%> gracious וְרַח֛וּם <S%H7349><s%> and merciful אֶֽרֶךְ־ <S%H750><s%> slow אַפַּ֥יִם <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and of great [וְחֶסֶד כ] (חֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> favour ק) וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עֲזַבְתָּֽם׃ <S%H5800><s%> and forsookest

אַ֗ף <S%H637><s%> Even כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> Yea when they had made לָהֶם֙ עֵ֣גֶל <S%H5695><s%> calf מַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> them a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> This [is] thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who הֶעֶלְךָ֖ <S%H5927><s%> that brought thee up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and had wrought נֶאָצ֖וֹת <S%H5007><s%> provocations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> great

וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בְּרַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> mercies הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> Yet thou in thy manifold לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor עֲזַבְתָּ֖ם <S%H5800><s%> forsookest בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> them not in the wilderness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> the pillar הֶ֠עָנָן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor סָ֨ר <S%H5493><s%> departed מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> by בְּיוֹמָם֙ <S%H3119><s%> not from them by day לְהַנְחֹתָ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> to lead בְּהַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> them in the way וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֨וּד <S%H5982><s%> neither the pillar הָאֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire בְּלַ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> by night לְהָאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> to shew them light לָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> go בָֽהּ׃

וְרוּחֲךָ֨ <S%H7307><s%> spirit הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> also thy good נָתַ֖תָּ <S%H5414><s%> Thou gavest לְהַשְׂכִּילָ֑ם <S%H7919><s%> to instruct וּמַנְךָ֙ <S%H4478><s%> not thy manna לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מָנַ֣עְתָּ <S%H4513><s%> them and withheldest מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> from their mouth וּמַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> them water נָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> and gavest לָהֶ֖ם לִצְמָאָֽם׃ <S%H6772><s%> for their thirst

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> Yea forty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years כִּלְכַּלְתָּ֥ם <S%H3557><s%> didst thou sustain בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor חָסֵ֑רוּ <S%H2637><s%> [so that] they lacked שַׂלְמֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H8008><s%> nothing their clothes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor בָל֔וּ <S%H1086><s%> waxed not old וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> and their feet לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בָצֵֽקוּ׃ <S%H1216><s%> swelled

וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> Moreover thou gavest לָהֶ֤ם מַמְלָכוֹת֙ <S%H4467><s%> them kingdoms וַעֲמָמִ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> and nations וַֽתַּחְלְקֵ֖ם <S%H2505><s%> and didst divide לְפֵאָ֑ה <S%H6285><s%> them into corners וַיִּֽירְשׁ֞וּ <S%H3423><s%> so they possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land סִיח֗וֹן <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the land מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land ע֥וֹג <S%H5747><s%> of Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan

וּבְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> Their children הִרְבִּ֔יתָ <S%H7235><s%> also multipliedst כְּכֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H3556><s%> thou as the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַתְּבִיאֵם֙ <S%H935><s%> and broughtest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which אָמַ֥רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> concerning which thou hadst promised לַאֲבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> to their fathers לָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> that they should go in לָרָֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> went in הַבָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> So the children וַיִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַתַּכְנַ֨ע <S%H3665><s%> and thou subduedst לִפְנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> them the inhabitants הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land הַכְּנַ֣עֲנִ֔ים <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites וַֽתִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and gavest בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> them into their hands וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> with their kings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַֽמְמֵ֣י <S%H5971><s%> and the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they might do בָּהֶ֖ם כִּרְצוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H7522><s%> with them as they would

וַֽיִּלְכְּד֞וּ <S%H3920><s%> And they took עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּצֻרוֹת֮ <S%H1219><s%> strong וַאֲדָמָ֣ה <S%H127><s%> land שְׁמֵנָה֒ <S%H8082><s%> and a fat וַיִּֽירְשׁ֡וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possessed בָּתִּ֣ים <S%H1004><s%> houses מְלֵֽאִים־ <S%H4392><s%> full כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every ט֠וּב <S%H2898><s%> of all goods בֹּר֨וֹת <S%H953><s%> wells חֲצוּבִ֜ים <S%H2672><s%> digged כְּרָמִ֧ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וְזֵיתִ֛ים <S%H2132><s%> and oliveyards וְעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees מַאֲכָ֖ל <S%H3978><s%> and fruit לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וַיֹּאכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> so they did eat וַֽיִּשְׂבְּעוּ֙ <S%H7646><s%> and were filled וַיַּשְׁמִ֔ינוּ <S%H8080><s%> and became fat וַיִּֽתְעַדְּנ֖וּ <S%H5727><s%> and delighted בְּטוּבְךָ֥ <S%H2898><s%> goodness הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> themselves in thy great

וַיַּמְר֨וּ <S%H4784><s%> Nevertheless they were disobedient וַֽיִּמְרְד֜וּ <S%H4775><s%> and rebelled בָּ֗ךְ וַיַּשְׁלִ֤כוּ <S%H7993><s%> against thee and cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8451><s%> thy law אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> behind גַוָּ֔ם <S%H1458><s%> their backs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֶ֣יךָ <S%H5030><s%> thy prophets הָרָ֔גוּ <S%H2026><s%> and slew אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הֵעִ֥ידוּ <S%H5749><s%> which testified בָ֖ם לַהֲשִׁיבָ֣ם <S%H7725><s%> against them to turn אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> them to thee and they wrought נֶאָצ֖וֹת <S%H5007><s%> provocations גְּדוֹלֹֽת׃ <S%H1419><s%> great

וַֽתִּתְּנֵם֙ <S%H5414><s%> Therefore thou deliveredst בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand צָֽרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6862><s%> of their enemies וַיָּצֵ֖רוּ <S%H3334><s%> be distressed לָהֶ֑ם וּבְעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> them and in the time צָֽרָתָם֙ <S%H6869><s%> of their trouble יִצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> when they cried אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> [them] from heaven תִּשְׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> unto thee thou heardest וּֽכְרַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> mercies הָֽרַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> and according to thy manifold תִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> thou gavest לָהֶם֙ מֽוֹשִׁיעִ֔ים <S%H3467><s%> them saviours וְיוֹשִׁיע֖וּם <S%H3467><s%> who saved מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand צָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6862><s%> of their enemies

וּכְנ֣וֹחַ <S%H5117><s%> But after they had rest לָהֶ֔ם יָשׁ֕וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> again לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> they did רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וַתַּֽעַזְבֵ֞ם <S%H5800><s%> thee therefore leftest בְּיַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> thou them in the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶם֙ <S%H341><s%> of their enemies וַיִּרְדּ֣וּ <S%H7287><s%> so that they had the dominion בָהֶ֔ם וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> over them yet when they returned וַיִּזְעָק֔וּךָ <S%H2199><s%> and cried וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you מִשָּׁמַ֧יִם <S%H8064><s%> [them] from heaven תִּשְׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> unto thee thou heardest וְתַצִּילֵ֥ם <S%H5337><s%> didst thou deliver כְּֽרַחֲמֶ֖יךָ <S%H7356><s%> them according to thy mercies רַבּ֥וֹת <S%H7227><s%> and many עִתִּֽים׃ <S%H6256><s%> times

וַתָּ֨עַד <S%H5749><s%> And testifiedst בָּהֶ֜ם לַהֲשִׁיבָ֣ם <S%H7725><s%> against them that thou mightest bring them again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תּוֹרָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H8451><s%> unto thy law וְהֵ֨מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they הֵזִ֜ידוּ <S%H2102><s%> yet they dealt proudly וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> and hearkened לְמִצְוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H4687><s%> not unto thy commandments וּבְמִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <S%H4941><s%> against thy judgments חָֽטְאוּ־ <S%H2398><s%> but sinned בָ֔ם אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> (which if a man וְחָיָ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> he shall live בָהֶ֑ם וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> turned כָתֵף֙ <S%H3802><s%> the shoulder סוֹרֶ֔רֶת <S%H5637><s%> A stubborn וְעָרְפָּ֥ם <S%H6203><s%> their neck הִקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H7185><s%> and hardened וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> and would not hear

וַתִּמְשֹׁ֤ךְ <S%H4900><s%> didst thou forbear עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> years רַבּ֔וֹת <S%H7227><s%> Yet many וַתָּ֨עַד <S%H5749><s%> them and testifiedst בָּ֧ם בְּרוּחֲךָ֛ <S%H7307><s%> against them by thy spirit בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> in נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <S%H5030><s%> thy prophets וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הֶאֱזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> yet would they not give ear וַֽתִּתְּנֵ֔ם <S%H5414><s%> therefore gavest בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> thou them into the hand עַמֵּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאֲרָצֹֽת׃ <S%H776><s%> of the lands

וּֽבְרַחֲמֶ֧יךָ <S%H7356><s%> mercies' הָרַבִּ֛ים <S%H7227><s%> Nevertheless for thy great לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עֲשִׂיתָ֥ם <S%H6213><s%> sake thou didst כָּלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> not utterly consume וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or עֲזַבְתָּ֑ם <S%H5800><s%> them nor forsake כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> God חַנּ֥וּן <S%H2587><s%> them for thou [art] a gracious וְרַח֖וּם <S%H7349><s%> and merciful אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֱ֠לֹהֵינוּ <S%H430><s%> Now therefore our God הָאֵ֨ל <S%H410><s%> God הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great הַגִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> the mighty וְהַנּוֹרָא֮ <S%H3372><s%> and the terrible שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> who keepest הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant וְהַחֶסֶד֒ <S%H2617><s%> and mercy אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִמְעַ֣ט <S%H4591><s%> seem little לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתְּלָאָ֣ה <S%H8513><s%> let not all the trouble אֲֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which מְ֠צָאַתְנוּ <S%H4672><s%> thee that hath come לִמְלָכֵ֨ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> upon us on our kings לְשָׂרֵ֧ינוּ <S%H8269><s%> on our princes וּלְכֹהֲנֵ֛ינוּ <S%H3548><s%> and on our priests וְלִנְבִיאֵ֥נוּ <S%H5030><s%> and on our prophets וְלַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and on our fathers וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and on all thy people מִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> since the time מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְלָכֵ֤ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> Neither have our kings שָׂרֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8269><s%> our princes כֹּהֲנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H3548><s%> our priests וַאֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> nor our fathers לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> kept תּוֹרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8451><s%> thy law וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Or הִקְשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7181><s%> nor hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִצְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H4687><s%> unto thy commandments וּלְעֵ֣דְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H5715><s%> and thy testimonies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הַעִידֹ֖תָ <S%H5749><s%> wherewith thou didst testify בָּהֶֽם׃

וְהֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> their own בְּמַלְכוּתָם֩ <S%H4438><s%> thee in their kingdom וּבְטוּבְךָ֨ <S%H2898><s%> goodness הָרָ֜ב <S%H7227><s%> and in thy great אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣תָּ <S%H5414><s%> that thou gavest לָהֶ֗ם וּבְאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הָרְחָבָ֧ה <S%H7342><s%> them and in the large וְהַשְּׁמֵנָ֛ה <S%H8082><s%> and fat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תָּ <S%H5414><s%> which thou gavest לִפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עֲבָד֑וּךָ <S%H5647><s%> For they have not served וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or שָׁ֔בוּ <S%H7725><s%> them neither turned מִמַּֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> works הָרָעִֽים׃ <S%H7451><s%> they from their wicked

הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day עֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> Behold we [are] servants וְהָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and [for] the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> that thou gavest לַאֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> unto our fathers לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> to eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְיָהּ֙ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טוּבָ֔הּ <S%H2898><s%> thereof and the good הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> thereof behold we [are] servants עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וּתְבוּאָתָ֣הּ <S%H8393><s%> increase מַרְבָּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> And it yieldeth much לַמְּלָכִ֛ים <S%H4428><s%> unto the kings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whom נָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> whom thou hast set עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּחַטֹּאותֵ֑ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> over us because of our sins וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over גְּ֠וִיֹּתֵינוּ <S%H1472><s%> over our bodies מֹשְׁלִ֤ים <S%H4910><s%> also they have dominion וּבִבְהֶמְתֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H929><s%> and over our cattle כִּרְצוֹנָ֔ם <S%H7522><s%> at their pleasure וּבְצָרָ֥ה <S%H6869><s%> distress גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> and we [are] in great אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> ourselves פ
